entries.journal_entry_description: A guard went missing down near the cargo holds. Find him and discover what happened to him.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Take the elevator to the lower level to find the missing guard.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Go to the elevator and take it down to the lower level of Tansarii Station. Talk to a guard that may have been hurt to find out what happened. If he follows his training, he should be near the elevator.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Find the Hurt Guard on the Lower Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Go into the lower cargo hold and kill at least 2 Bocatts and harvest their hide to bring back to Raylen.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Kill 2 Bocatts and Harvest Their Hides in Cargo Bay 1
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Once you have the harvested skin from the bocatts, use the elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to the Ranged Combat Training Room with at least one bocatt hide.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Return to Raylen in the Ranged Combat Training Room
